BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove index blocks by default in create_from (#120643) Change the default value for the `remove_index_blocks` parameter of the `_create_from` api to true. This means that when a source index has blocks, by default these blocks will be filtered out when creating the destination index.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Mute org.elasticsearch.xpack.test.rest.XPackRestIT test {p0=migrate/30_create_from/Test create_from with remove_index_blocks set to false} #120657
